MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the SY22 postcode area of Llansantffraid. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 11:24AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:20PM on 3rd March 2021
